2-7 years Software Developer
   About Us
  Neemtree is a Specialized Talent Solutions Firm with focus on Internet,  Mobile,  Cloud,  Software Products,  and IT Sectors. 

Our Talent services include Recruitment,  Staffing,  Corporate Recruiter Training. We bring strong domain expertise in the sectors of Consumer Internet,  Consumer Mobile,  E-Commerce,  M-Commerce,  Cloud Computing,  SaaS,  B2B Internet based services,  and related areas. 

Because of our focus and domain knowledge we are able to provide superior service to our clients. Our current clients include established companies,  early stage and late stage start ups backed by Marquee Venture Capital firms. 

  Why Us
  - Clients are Top 100 IT product companies
- Clients and their Employees are top 10% of talent in India
- Work culture that nurtures growth and learning
- Monday to Friday working /  Team development on 1st Saturdays
